name: GSM Arena
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam for 2017 and the theme was "Waves"

Objective:
You are both Smartphone agents trying to prove who has a better Wifi Signal.
Shoot the signals towards your opponent and watch them blow up, unless they diffuse it first. If you ran out of wifi signal, grab the nearest mobile near you, and you can discard the old phone as bomb.

Buttons:
Player 1
- WASD (Movement)
- G (Shoot)
- H (Throw Phone)
- J (Diffuse)

Player 2
- Arrow Keys (Movement)
- Comma (Shoot)
- Period (Throw Phone)
- Slash (Diffuse)
